mapper.select: SELECT t1.villageCode, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.cameraId) AS deviceIds FROM cw_base_village t1 LEFT JOIN cw_base_camera t2 ON t1.villageCode = t2.villageCode WHERE t1.state=0 AND t2.state=0 GROUP BY t1.villageCode

SELECT t1.villageName, t1.villageCode, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.cameraId) AS deviceIds FROM cw_base_village t1 LEFT JOIN cw_base_camera t2 ON t1.villageCode = t2.villageCode WHERE t1.state=0 AND t2.state=0 AND t2.cameraType=2 GROUP BY t1.villageCode

SELECT c.id, c.cameraId, c.cameraName, c.orgId, o.org_cname AS orgName, c.sceneId, s.scene AS sceneName, c.installAdd, c.cameraType, e.enumName AS cameraTypeName, c.streamSource, c.lon, c.lat, c.cameraEnabled FROM cw_base_camera c LEFT JOIN cw_ge_organization o ON c.orgId = o.org_id LEFT JOIN cw_base_scene s ON c.sceneId = s.id LEFT JOIN cw_base_enum e ON e.enumType = 'CAMERA_TYPE' AND c.cameraType = e.enumValue WHERE c.id = #{id}
